comments.body: This is not directly related to this PR, but it makes me wondering: why do we keep a separate `range / all` in extended `Segment` interface? Should we just remove that? Now we've added the reverse ones but only in the parent interface, it makes me feeling the original ones on `Segment` is not necessary.
Yeah that's a good question, it does seem like we can just remove the `range` and `all` on the Segment interface
